description: Versatile cauliflower makes a great base for this bowl.
name: Cauliflower Rice Tabouli Bowl Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the cauliflower “rice”' in a bowl. Add the cucumber slices, roasted tomatoes, and falafels. Sprinkle with the toasted nuts and pomegranate seeds, then drizzle with the tahini and lemon dressing. Season with salt and pepper.
